document_data.mainbody:
obs Loss was a small road that was located in the city of Waterdeep.
Dobs Loss was located in the southwest section of Waterdeeps Sea Ward. The road branched west off of the northern tip of the Street of the Singing Dolphin, ending at the Field of Triumph on the Lions a short distance away. Seawatch Street and the Street of Whispers merged to connect with the western end of Dobs Loss.
